title: Can't recover account

labels.name: priority 0: blocker
labels.description: an issues that requires immediate attention and that causes the app to not work at all (e.g a crash)

body: okay , the reason for this is that it is no longer possible to run 2 instances of the app at the same time for status.prod fleet
to run this in dev, one should use `WAKUV2_PORT=1234 make run`
